name: realtimechatapp
description: ## 1. Real-Time communication kya hota hai.  - Real time communication ka matlab hai data instantly exchange hona,bina page reload hue.  - browser me ye websockets ya socket.io ke through possible hai.  - tradittional http me browser request bhejta hai-> server response deta hai -> fir next request.    - **Limitaion**->slow aur page reload chahiye update ke liye. - Socket.io/WebSocket -> connection ek baar establish -> server aur client dono continuously data bhej sakte hain.
